item.description:
It's that time of the year..... to go see the awesome trees!!!

 

The Festival of Trees has been a catalyst for historic preservation in Methuen and the Merrimack Valley. It began as a fundraiser to support the restoration of the Tenney Gatehouse in Methuen, the Festival of Trees has donated more than $1,200,000 in funds to preserve our area’s historic treasures. This investment has been possible because of the generosity and creativity of those businesses, organizations, families and individuals that have made our Festival a truly magical event and due to the commitment of countless volunteers who give their time and energy to make the Festival successful.

This event has been a Thanksgiving weekend tradition with our groups, so let's go another year and see the beautiful trees!  There will be over 200+ decorated Christmas Trees and you can buy tickets to win on the beautiful trees.....what a concept: a tree that comes all decorated....and who knows maybe you could get lucky enough to win one of them.

 

Things you must know before RSVPing to this event: The weather outside may be cold, but inside is very warm, there is a place to hang your jacket if you bring one.  We may stay together or get separated, the trees are in an office park waiting area, it can get very crowded and lots of people. if you are not into crowds then this event may not be for you, please take that into consideration when you put your RSVP in.  The building/office park can be a little difficult to find, and parking may be difficult, give yourself a little extra time for both of these.

COST:

General Admission: $10.00 for Adults 
Children under 12 FREE and they are more than welcome at this event!
Children age 14 or younger must be accompanied by an adult.
Tickets for the raffling of the trees is a separate cost.

 

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: THERE ARE 2 DOORS I will be at the door to the RIGHT if you are looking at the building, if it is not that cold I will be outside, if not come in that door and or find us inside.
